dcterms:description: A dataset containing approximately 20,000 frames for robot pose detection, focusing on keypoints of a robotic arm in a controlled environment. The data was annotated to include keypoints and segmentation masks for the robotic arm.
dcterms:title: Keypoints for Pose Detection

dcterms:creator: G. Reis

dcterms:description: A dataset generated for segmentation tasks related to robot maintenance, providing segmentation masks for the robotic arm and its keypoints.
dcterms:title: Segmentation for Data Support
